thread.title: Travel update: Delays on A34 after lorry spills load | Meridian
thread.title_full: Travel update: Delays on A34 after lorry spills load | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Travel update: Delays on A34 after lorry spills load | Meridian
text:
One lane blocked and queueing traffic due to boxes on road on A34 Northbound between A30 / A303 and A343 / Andover Road.
A lorry has overturned on the southbound A34 and partly gone in to the central reservation. It's load has spilled out and some boxes and emergency services may be in lane two
Brittany Ferries @BrittanyFerries Follow TRAFFIC | The A34 is closed southbound near Newbury following an accident. Please allow more time if using this route towards Portsmouth.
06:39 - 26 Aug 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Wed 26 Aug 2015 Read more 8 updates Lorry overturns on A34 spilling its load of boxes Travel Berkshire Hampshire & Isle of Wight
